job_description:
Who needs insurance? Everybody. That keeps us busy. Very busy. At the Intact Lab, we use machine learning, data science, software engineering, AI, agility, UX and design thinking to transform the customer experience for millions of Canadians.

Join our team and get ready to explore, take risks, make mistakes, and learn all day, every day. We’ll support your goals with tools, opportunities, and flexibility. It’s our employee promise.

Our hybrid work model provides the balance between working from home and enjoying meaningful in-person interactions.

Ready to make your mark?

About The Role

Alongside a multidisciplinary team in a high-performance environment that promotes autonomy, you will work to solve complex problems and challenges and execute fresh ideas to help push the needle forward and meet the evolving needs of our customers. Our teams design and develop new technologies and products that transform the way thousands of people interact with insurance. We are looking for software developers who can bring innovative ideas.

What You’ll Do Here
Support in the development of major systems using new Web and application technologies
Improve and/or develop functionalities to meet the needs of users by designing solutions, solving problems, producing estimates of the work to be done and by programming, testing, debugging and documenting the work
Develop/support web applications and Java services in Agile mode
Be part of the developer’s community, participate in the continuous improvement and best practices
What You Bring To The Table
An Agile/Scrum/Safe and DevOps mindset
Passionate about building software products
Stimulated by challenges
Creative, curious and resourceful
Team player who can share and receive feedback
Excellent at putting together your ideas to different stakeholders
Organized, proactive and a driver of change
Comfortablee working in a constant evolving technological environment
Our Play Ground
Very good knowledge: Angular, Javascritpt, CSS
Good knowledge: Java
Web Dev: Angular, Java, Spring Boot + Spring Cloud, MongoDB, Oracle, SOAP
Tools: GitHub, JIRA/Confluence, Teams, IntelliJ
CI/CD : Jenkins, Veracode, SonarQube – Twistlock
Hosting : Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, Elastic Search, Logstash, Kibana
What We Are Looking For

If you have 6+ years experience as a developer, we are interested in meeting with you and finding out what you could bring to our team! We are looking for motivated, curious and resourceful people, ready to contribute and receive feedback and concerned about quality. We are looking for bilingual talents as it is needed to interact on a regular basis with colleagues across the country.

#LI - Hybrid

What We Offer

Working here means you'll be empowered to be and do your best every day. Here is some of what you can expect as a permanent member of our team:
A financial rewards program that recognizes your success
An industry leading Employee Share Purchase Plan; we match 50% of net shares purchased
An extensive flex pension and benefits package, with access to virtual healthcare
Flexible work arrangements
Possibility to purchase up to 5 extra days off per year
An annual wellness account that promotes an active and healthy lifestyle
Access to tools and resources to support physical and mental health, embracing change and connecting with colleagues
A dynamic workplace learning ecosystem complete with learning journeys, interactive online content, and inspiring programs
Inclusive employee-led networks to educate, inspire, amplify voices, build relationships and provide development opportunities
Inspiring leaders and colleagues who will lift you up and help you grow
A Community Impact program, because what you care about is a part of what makes you different. And how you contribute to your community should be just as unique
We are an equal opportunity employer

At Intact, we value diversity and strive to create an inclusive, accessible workplace where all individuals feel valued, respected, and heard.

If we can provide a specific adjustment to make the recruitment process more accessible for you, please let us know when we reach out about a job opportunity. We’ll work with you to meet your needs.
